meanings.definition: Not visited or traveled by many people.
meanings.sent1: The unfrequented path through the forest was peaceful and quiet.
meanings.sent2: The old, unfrequented house at the end of the street looked eerie.
meanings.sent3: The unfrequented park became a favorite spot for the squirrels to play hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: Her unfrequented thoughts wandered to distant memories of childhood.
meanings.sent5: The unfrequented beach was a hidden gem, untouched by tourists.

meanings.definition: Rarely visited or traveled by people.
meanings.sent1: The unfrequented cafe on the corner struggled to attract customers.
meanings.sent2: The unfrequented mountain trail offered stunning views without the crowds.
meanings.sent3: The unfrequented library had books so dusty, they seemed to have stories of their own.
meanings.sent4: His unfrequented heart longed for companionship in the quiet solitude.
meanings.sent5: The unfrequented alley behind the market was a haven for stray cats.
